title: BugCat Capoo
blurb: A popular character by Taiwanese artist Yara.
desc: A cartoon character resembling a chubby blue cat with six legs. He is the namesake and main subject of a webcomic strip on Facebook and Instagram, cartoon clips on YouTube, and stickers on LINE and other social media. He was created by the Taiwanese artist Yara in 2014.

title: Chip
desc: A printed chip. One of Taiwan's largest industry is semiconductors.

title: Taipei 101
blurb: Iconic building in the heart of the capital
desc: The tallest building in Taiwan. Located in the capital Taipei, it is popular destination for locals and tourists alike. It hosts high-end stores, restaurants, and an observation tower on top.

title: Formosan Black Bear
desc: The Formosan black bear is a bear endemic to Taiwan. They are considered a Taiwanese national symbol. They are famous for their distinctive V-collars, and they are the largest land animals in Taiwan.

title: Boba Tea
desc: Boba Tea is a famous drink originating from Taiwan. Since then, it has spread around the world and become a popular drink.

title: Taiwan Blue Magpie
desc: The Taiwan Blue Magpie is a bird endemic to Taiwan. It is famous for its friendliness with humans, distinctive appearance and relationship with Taiwanese aboriginal tribes, some which hold this bird sacred.

title: Baltic Friendship Heart
desc: A heart symbolising the alliance and friendship with the Baltics. Hearts on r/place are commonly used to signify strong relationships between neighbouring art communities.

title: Taiwan Beer
desc: Commonly found in bars and convenience stores alike, Taiwan Beer is one of Taiwan's most famous and recognizable beverages.

title: Taiwan Apple Cider
